Title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
Writer: Yoru Sumino (novel), Shin'ichirô Ushijima (screenplay), Erica Mendez (adaptation)
Actors: Mahiro Takasugi, Lynn, Yukiyo Fujii, Yuma Uchida
Plot: A young man begins to fall in love with one of his classmates, who is slowly dying from a fatal pancreatic disease, and helps her live her life to the fullest before she inevitably passes on.
